columns.text: Above the endless Aegean blue, under the most majestic sunset and with a view of one of the planet’ s most energized volcano.Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.Suites are different in size and formation while an endless palette of coloring combinations offers to each one a unique personality and a singular style.Each suite offers stunning views to the Caldera, Thirassia, the volcano and the village of Oia. Hospitality reaches new heights at Santorini’s latest landmark; a top-notch cluster of uber elegant suites scattered on a steep rocky slope of the island’s famous Caldera, subtly linked with luring steps to form a delightful hamlet. The ten individually designed colour-coded suites, complemented by a secluded exclusive villa, are housed in some of the island’s immaculately restored signature caves and exude a feeling of intimacy, exclusive luxury and local allure, while ideally bridging the awe-inspiring sleeping volcano with romantic sunsets.

items.title: Above Blue Villa
items.description: Villa (130 sq.m) with outdoor private plunge pool and terrace (30 sq.m) + Up to 4 guests (adults) + Middle level/Next to the hotel’s main building + 1 Bedroom/King size bed + 1 Loft Bedroom+Queen size bed + 2 bathrooms with couple-sized shower.
items.excerpt: Villa (130 sq.m) with outdoor private plunge pool and terrace (30 sq.m) + Up to 4 guests (adults) + Middle level/Next to the hotel’s main building + 1 Bedroom/King size bed + 1 Loft Bedroom+Queen size bed + 2 bathrooms with couple-sized shower.

items.title: Heaven | Outdoor Jacuzzi Suite – Non Refundable Offer
items.description: Enter the heavenly world of turquoise-blue and let yourself to be part of the sea and the sky. See the colors of the sunset from your bed, enjoy your heated outdoor Jacuzzi during the midnight hours under the clear skies, and share the experience of your privacy. Spend the day in your balcony with the unlimited view of 180 degrees from the South to the North. Light up the candles in the turquoise cave sofa or enjoy a shower in the bathroom with the black and turquoise glass mosaic. Dream, while you see the lightening of Oia Village right after the nightfall. Located in the middle level of the complex, this suite has the atmosphere of the tranquil Heaven.
items.excerpt: This Rate Includes American Champagne Breakfast a la carte,  served in the privacy of your suite

items.title: Good to Know:
items.description: Above the endless Aegean blue, under the most majestic sunset and with a view of one of the planet’ s most energized volcano.

items.title: Aliko Luxury Suites
items.description: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece. Located on the most privileged spot of the island, in the scenic village of Imerovigli, at the highest point of the world-famous volcanic Caldera, they offer from all angles an alluring sea view of the Aegean Sea, a big part of Santorini, the neighbouring islands, and the stunning Caldera. Being the best choice for suites accommodation in Imerovigli, Aliko Luxury Suites guarantee an unforgettable romantic escape for couples. In a splendid exclusive setting, admiring the fascinating sea view, you will feel like the blessed inhabitants of a private paradise. Design is slick and minimal while staying true to the traditional style and not compromising on the extra touches that put these suites among the very best luxury accommodations on Santorini.
items.excerpt: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano and sunset
Complimentary champagne glasses on the first sunset

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece.

items.title: Ayoba Santorini
items.description: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! It is slang for “cool, alright, ok”. In Zulu, it means “will be”. Ayoba is a feel-good word. It takes us to our a happy place. A place that’s more than alright actually, better then cool: the ravishing slice of Santorini. Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. The secluded location of Ayoba will evoke your senses as you peacefully surrender to the ageless spell of Santorini.
items.excerpt: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira.

amenities.item: An authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, Santorini island
Consisting of two suites and four double studios

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira.

SEO.title: Above Blue Suites | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotels' Above Blue Suites are 10 elegant suites on the slope of Santorini's Caldera. Individually designed & exude luxury and intimacy.
